faqs.question: Are these products real killer whales?
faqs.answer: No, absolutely not! All Dwarf Orca products are collectible merchandise, plushies, figurines, and pins. We definitely do not sell actual killer whales - miniature or otherwise. This is a joke shop celebrating our love of orcas.

faqs.question: When will items be back in stock?
faqs.answer: We're currently restocking our inventory. Please check back soon for updates! Follow our social media for announcements about new stock arrivals.

faqs.question: Do you ship internationally?
faqs.answer: Currently, we only ship within the United States. International shipping options may be available in the future. Contact us for more information about your location.

faqs.question: What's your return policy?
faqs.answer: We want you to be happy with your purchase! Items can be returned within 30 days of purchase in original condition. Please contact our customer service team to arrange a return.

faqs.question: Are your products eco-friendly?
faqs.answer: We're committed to sustainability. Our plushies are made with soft, durable materials, and our packaging uses recyclable materials. We're continuously working to improve our environmental impact.

faqs.question: Can I request custom products?
faqs.answer: We love custom requests! If you have an idea for a unique orca-themed product, please reach out to us at custom@dwarforca.com with your idea.
